scripts.build:wasm: cd ./src/c-to-wasm/func && emcc -lembind -o func.js func.c --embind-emit-tsd types -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -sWASM=1 -s ERROR_ON_UNDEFINED_SYMBOLS=0 -s 'EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["ccall", "cwrap"]'
scripts.build:wasm_packaged: cd ./src/c-to-wasm/func && emcc -lembind -o func.js func.c --embind-emit-tsd types -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -sWASM=0 -s ERROR_ON_UNDEFINED_SYMBOLS=0
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts && npm run build:copy_wasm
scripts.prebuildpackage: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:copy_wasm
